column1: 0439|twenty-one minutes to five|At zero hour minus one minute
column2: twenty-one minutes to five on March the twenty-first
column3: Jiffy Tripp stood in the tranches beside an infantry officer
column4: looking over no man's land. It was still dark. At zero hour plus five seconds the shell bursts actually threw a sort of witch's kaleidoscope onto no man's land
column5: and he was reaching for the SOS rockets. Red - green - red.
